titles.title: Proposing an amendment to the Constitution of the United States prohibiting the penalty of death.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on the Judiciary.
Referred to the Subcommittee on the Constitution, Civil Rights, and Civil Liberties.

bill.summary:
4/16/2008--Introduced.
Constitutional Amendment - Prohibits the United States or any state from imposing or carrying out the death penalty.
